title: Password change
content: The user code and password for each employee, manager(s), or Administrator(s) can be found in Employee file > Parameters > Mobile and Web access.Change your own passwordIf you are connected to your account you can personalize your password:Click on your name at the top right (next to the logout button),Click on My Employee profile (next to the Validate button),In the Parameters section, click on Mobile and Web access,Erase the contents of Password and write the new password desired,Click on Save.Change another user's passwordOn the Employees menu, click on Search, type the name of the employee, then click on Search,Once in his Employee's file, in the Parameters section, click on Web and Mobile access,Erase the contents of Password and write the new password desired,Click on Save.If the employee has made too many incorrect passwords attempts you may have to reactivate their account. If you want to change the number of password attempts before blocking, please refer to this article.If the employee wishes to personalize his password, he can do it himself by following these steps: via the web portal, via the mobile application.Connected article: Add email and send login information in batchHelpful?00Updated: 3 years ago Share :
